name: turbolight
description: A lightweight, vanilla JavaScript lightbox that works with Turbo Streams
author: alexwebgr

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.build:js: esbuild src/index.js --bundle --minify --sourcemap --target=es2015 --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.esm.js && esbuild src/index.js --bundle --minify --sourcemap --target=es2015 --format=cjs --outfile=dist/index.js && esbuild src/index.js --bundle --sourcemap --target=es2015 --format=iife --global-name=TurboLight --outfile=dist/index.umd.js && esbuild src/index.js --bundle --minify --sourcemap --target=es2015 --format=iife --global-name=TurboLight --outfile=dist/index.umd.min.js
